projects.title: Horned-Beast
projects.description: In this project I used react to display cards on a page, using a data component to render each unique card. I also used javascript and state to filter and map the data to display a unique modal when the image is clicked and to filter the beasts by the number of horns.

projects.title: Tetris
projects.description: In this project I implemented the canvas API in Vanilla JS to create a game of tetris. I used constructor functions to create unique pieces on the grid and the wrote methods for the rotation for each piece as well as a method for the horizontal and vertical translation. I created a collision system where pieces would stop once they collide or reach the bottom of the game space.
